description: My fav biscuits are crackers, if you can't go out to the shops try this recipe to make your own crackers.
name: Thin and Crispy Crackers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs cold butter, cut into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Put Flour, salt & sugar into a food processor with the metal blade, pulse to combine.
Add the butter & pulse to make coarse crumbs.
Gradually add the milk, pulse to combine until the dough comes together and makes a ball.
Place the dough onto a floured surface. Roll the dough into a rectangle shape to the thickness you would like your crackers to be.
Cut the dough into cracker size of your choice. eg: 5cm squares
Sprinkle lightly with Sea Salt, gently press the salt into the dough. Prick holes into the dough with a fork to prevent puffing.

Put the squares onto a baking sheet & bake for 10 minutes. Rotate the tray and bake another 10 minutes. Reduce oven temperature to 90 deg and bake a further 7 minutes. Keep a close eye on the so they dont burn or go too brown.
Cool the crackers on a wire rack & store in an airtight container.
